name: Staff of Toxins
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Magic Items/Staves/Staff of Toxins

sections.body:
This length of hemlock-shrouded oak gives off the faintest whiff of rot and corruption. It allows use of the following spells:

  • stinking cloud (1 charge)
  • cloudkill (2 charges)
sections.name: Description
